price: 21. Sakyk: „Iš tiesų, aš neturiu jums (galios dėl) žalos ar teisingo kelio.“
arabic: قُلۡ إِنِّي لَآ أَمۡلِكُ لَكُمۡ ضَرّٗا وَلَا رَشَدٗا

version.title: Lithuanian Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Lithuanian By Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: qul innī lā amliku lakum ḍarran walā rashadan
